result.adr_address: Hong Kong, Yau Ma Tei, Waterloo Rd, 23號城景國際大堂
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, Yau Ma Tei, Waterloo Rd, 23號城景國際大堂
result.name: Amazing

reviews.text: Amazingly lousy food, sorry to say this. The rice paper rolls were crinkly. The chicken was over grilled and dry with no surprise improvement even with the sauce provided. The pad Thai was unlike any other pad Thai I have ever had. However, this place is great for catching up with friends when great food doesn't count. I hope they do better with the quality of food and service.

Exceptionally expensive Thai food, taste is not impressive. We ordered a 6 ppl dinner set and it is just about 4 ppl portion. Service is okay though, and guess it is never full so easy to get a table.

Afternoon Tea - choice of English or Thai - This is a nice relaxed restaurant in the lobby. English afternoon tea has your choice of tea, smoked salmon, shrimp, chicken wings...sweets included scone with clotted cream, various sweets/bonbons, macaroons, cake, chocolate mousse and raspberry. HK$ 279 for two. Very nice, no disappointments.
The coconut pudding is the highlight of the night.  But unfortunately the entire dinner set is really nothing special
Coconut milk pudding very yummy and size allows sharing among two. I was a bit disappointed of the curry taste (veggie curry). Staff very friendly.

result.name: Amazing

reviews.text: 咁大隻生蝦唔好食，泰國菜唔正宗。

食物水準ok，但份量太少，價錢貴，
服務亦不覺得好

Amazingly lousy food, sorry to say this. The rice paper rolls were crinkly. The chicken was over grilled and dry with no surprise improvement even with the sauce provided. The pad Thai was unlike any other pad Thai I have ever had. However, this place is great for catching up with friends when great food doesn't count. I hope they do better with the quality of food and service.

平日中午時段優惠八折
對甜點要求高的人不要抱期望
煎餃飽滿好吃
水果不夠新鮮
咖喱雜菜味道很好
其他尚可
太貪婪吃太多
吃到最後不知道自己在吃什麼
價位來說算便宜
環境舒適，食物不錯，朋友聚會值得考慮一個好去處。

result.adr_address: 23 Waterloo Rd, Yau Ma Tei, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 23 Waterloo Rd, Yau Ma Tei, Hong Kong
result.name: The Cityview

reviews.text: This review is for the ball room facilities. I attended a party in the afternoon with buffet provided. I find the hotel and venue are quite good. The crystal ball room is decent and of medium size which suits most people. Food offering is ok, not the top best but passable.
Great value. Clean, modern, spacious room. Good lighting. Nice open view. Friendly staff.

Great location. Considering it's HK, the room very spacious and comfortable for the rate I paid. Mattress is a bit but it's ok for me. Plus I got a good view and luckily quiet neighbour throughout my stay. I did get 2 unsuspecting "visitors" at night or else this would be a full 5 star stay.
Very nice staff and team. Clean place, my kids were happy and the hubby too. Nice place to stay.
The hospitality of the staff was nice and friendly. They were of great help and made my family feel welcomed. We enjoyed our stay at The Cityview.

result.adr_address: 香港油麻地窩打老道23號
result.formatted_address: 香港油麻地窩打老道23號
result.name: 城景國際

reviews.text: 抵食超值👍

Weekend Tea Buffet👍🏻👍🏻之: 一早book好枱全家食”榴連x芒果Tea Buffet”@城景國際酒店. 下晝三點半開始我地三點三就到了, 夠鐘入場嘅場面我真係嚇左一大跳, 所有人熟悉地報上訂枱編號後爭相擠入內, 當時我唸: 入到去應該係一番撕殺, 實會有搶食物嘅狀況出現. 
>
坐低後去巡下有咩食先: 甜品, movenpick雪糕corner, 三文治, 熱葷, 燕窩粥, 粉麵檔, 仲有最排長龍嘅海鮮.
>
當日有三款海鮮, 青口, 蝦, 八爪魚🐙. 睇黎我係俾剛入場嗰幕嚇左一嚇原來大家只係心急入座: 香港人真心高質守秩序!! 無人一下拎超多, 拎完亦會將鉗傳俾下一個, 食左一輪海鮮, 質素好好呀新鮮好味👍🏻.
>
個人覺得燕窩粥係一大亮點, 艇仔粥面有一大羹燕窩, 夠哂足料👏🏻.
>
留返個肚食甜品同雪糕係必須ga 🤩, 即焗榴連Soufflé, 榴連雞蛋仔, 榴連布甸, 榴連拿破倫, 芒果mochi, 芒果卷蛋, 斑蘭蛋糕, 芝士蛋糕.... 幾乎每款都試匀呢, 仲有四款味道(芒果忌廉, 朱古力, 士多啤利, 雲呢拿) movenpick雪糕無限loop超正🤪. 
>
Remarks: 要俾每人HKD100deposit埋單時扣返.
ツアーで泊まりましたが、地下鉄の駅からも近く、観光途中に疲れて一旦休憩に戻るのも楽でした。部屋もまあまあキレイで、お湯も問題なく出てバスタブ付き。使い捨てスリッパや買い物した時の不織布サブバッグまで用意があって、袋が有料の香港では助かった。フロントも笑顔でよかった。
房門設計不良，關門聲超大，只要有人進出都知道，吵死人，聽得到隔壁房客說話，完全沒隔音，客房打掃算乾淨，但地毯老舊陳年痕跡髒污，洗臉枱設計不良，櫃枱會一直要加價升等剛裝潢好的房間，不然就給你爛房間囉。

非常喜歡這裏，中午的自助餐，食物質素好及有許多品種，早上時間由12時至3時，時間好充裕，可以慢慢品嚐喜歡的食物，雖然時間差不多到尾聲，仍然不斷渗滿食物， 
價錢不貴，長者七折後佰陸元左右，成人差不多市2O0元，在熱鬧的大道上，和朋友消磨一個下午，不錯！
